item.title: Head of Remote - Here's what you need to know
item.description: Head of Remote - Here’s what you need to know No one has to tell you that the world is changing. The workforce has shifted dramatically over the last few decades, and remote work is now more popular than ever. With this shift in working styles, companies are looking for new ways to lead their employees from a distance. This means that there’s been an increased demand for Head of Remote roles ‚Äì but what exactly does it mean to be a Head of Remote?
